channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: July jobs report shows unemployment rising, jobs market eroding
Exxon Mobil, Chevron say oil production is booming and they’re rolling in cash
Live Updates: Trump's tariffs kick in, reversing decades of global trade expansion
item.description: Trump's extensive new tariff regime on swathes of U.S. partners have reignited trade tensions, sending shock waves through markets.

item.title: Dow drops 500 points, Treasury yields slide after weak July jobs report
Amazon’s stock is falling, as this trend from earnings has investors worried
Investors will be watching the jobs report for signals about the Fed's next step
Another late-night Trump trade twist — just hours before the world hit go
item.description: Trump’s late-night tariff moves have become a hallmark, catching markets off guard, reshaping deals, and forcing countries to react in real time.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says 'we have the makings of a deal' with China
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Thursday expressed confidence that the U.S. and China are on the way to a trade pact as a key tariff deadline near...

item.title: Appeals court skeptical of Trump tariff authority
item.description: Trump's reciprocal tariffs and trafficking-related duties were previously struck down by a federal trade court, but that decision was put on pause.

item.title: Trump extends Mexico's 25% tariffs for 90 days as talks continue
item.description: President Donald Trump said he would not raise U.S. tariffs on Mexican goods beyond their current levels for 90 days.
